title: I forgot my password and don't want to lose any data, as it is important.
content: I forgot my password and I cannot log into my phone. I have tried a lot passwords and my phone is locking everytime. I don't want to erase my data, as there are a lot of things important to me. Is there anyway to unlock my phone. I can prove that it is my phone by many ways. I need help fast. Thank you
